verbatim_example: Tried to cold turkey but failed.
Tried to cold turkey but failed.
I last Monday I stopped all benzo/adderall use and tapered down to Kratom.
I went cold turkey off a decent xanax addiction during the same time I jumped off the more powerful DHC to kratom.

Now after 3 weeks I am back in that place I was months ago. Sometimes I think a work routine, being around co-workers, etc will be good to establish before jumping off all the way. Basically use Kratom like suboxone. Sometimes I feel like I should just white knuckle another week of trying to go ct and see how I feel.
I am in the thick of wd. I can't do this
I still haven't had the withdrawals I was expecting, no shitting water, no puking, no seizures (from benzo wd), no sweats.
Now that I am clean, I can barely get out of bed bc back and knees are so bad.
I am happy to be here, sober .
I celebrated by not using. It was hard, so hard to actually deal with all that pain, and all of those emotions, but I made it.
I have been taking kratom since Tuesday to help withdrawal.
This is the only period of sobriety I've had in 10 years.
Eight days down, moving into day 9.

This shit isn't easy... but that shouldn't be the reason you don't stop using. It's not supposed to be easy, you're trying to rescue your hijacked brain and body from something that's held it hostage for however long.
Closing in on 3 weeks, Still some morning GI stuff. Clams come and go.
Symptoms at 3 weeks out... broken sleep of 4-6 hours, morning shits (a very zen one this morning at least), anhedonia waves, come and go restless limbs.
Felt like day 4 of withdrawals out of the blue.
I've gone this long...this must be the last time.
I've now gone five days without
Got lots of benzos just in case.
I've gone further than I thought I could.
I'm here at work listening to baseball Geaux tigers! No cravings really. Achy. Zero sleep. But I feel so much better than just yesterday.
I was so fucked up on dope and xanax and kpins that i blacked out the entire way.
This is the longest I've been sober in a year at least.
Anyways, at anytime I keep at least 40 pounds of poppyseeds incase the site I order from gets shut down, or something gets lost in the male, by doing this, I haven't WD'd in close to 2 years,
I'm going to get totally straight hamstered!
I don't WD often because I keep like 80 pounds of poppy seeds under my bed. But when I do WD, I WD badly because of my tolerance.
I bought some Kratom, and have some muscle relaxers for the withdrawl I may experience.
I've even gone to the gym a few times.

I would always get clean for a month or two, or three, and think to myself "Wow is this what being clean is like? If so, then I'm never going to succeed because I still feel extremely far from normal". I would then relapse: then use until I ran out of money or got caught by a DT, or whatever it was that would make me start the 'cleanliness' cycle all over again.
Well consider this: there is no better time than now, because it always is ‘now’. If you put it off until tomorrow, it will still be ‘now’, just tomorrow! And today will be gone.
I was in recovery, and actually a year or so into it at that point.
Clean for over two years... Why am I still searching this shit.
I am on day 15 without Heroin.
I no i need to pick myself up as soon as i can.
It feels like more days should have gone by cause it seems to be so damn slow. Im sick of feeling like crap, throwing up, being depressed and i wish it would hurry up and go away.
Today i am 15 days off heroin.
Im on day two without heroin.
I am day 10 off heroin and alcohol been in hospital (was brought in there the other day) for dehydration and withdrawals.
I am on day 15 off heroin.
"Must Not Sleep… must warn others"- I got this cause to me it's about staying self aware and in the moment which is a huge part of recovery and growing as a person.
My first sober Halloween in 5 years!
This was the last time I hope I would ever use heroin.
Before my relapse 1 and 1/2 years ago, I had almost three years clean
I'm baaaack! Not that anyone noticed I was even gone lmao.
I'm currently finishing up my fifth day sober-ish (on xanax rn) and through the worst of the physical WDs.
I forced myself to detox by going on vacation with no dope starting on Monday, and got home yesterday. Today Junky Jesus screws me over by turning up 4x oxy 80mg's.

I feel that going through the withdrawals combined with not having any crutches will give me some enlightenment and allow me to completely focusing on recovery instead of worrying about my next nic fix.
Currently working on an immodium taper, because I cannot deal with the vomiting, which I get REALLY bad during w/ds.

I had once mega dosed on Lope when I couldn't get seeds, and while it was miserable it did trade ~80% of W/D symptoms, for a aching upset stomach, but no vomiting, which was key for me. So I knew if I was going to quit the Lope method was an option.

Tomorrow marks 1 week since my last 2lb dose of PST. Symptoms have been managed with Lope for the first 2 days, and then nothing stronger than an ill advised couple Benadryl on day 3, and a few advil.
One of the times I cleaned up in the past, of an oxycontin habit of 80-120 mg a day, I went in to a bit of a manic episode.  It lasted about 3 weeks and fucked me up bad...
I have the worst headache of my life achey and chilly, when I'm not feeling on fire. My guts also are, not great.
I had got some weed from an ex-coworker in preparation for early withdrawals because I'm a baby, didn't know this guy at all from when I was using, just heard he dealt.
I'm also ice cold, is that a withdrawal thing?
I got dizzy and nauseous and angry, I felt attacked (which is nuts).
Hold on guys, we can kick this shit!
When I kicked opiates I also kicked caffeine, and I haven't had a drink in a long time. And I promise myself that after the hell of withdrawal I will never go down that road again.
My body is like an old, tired sock... I keep wanting to stretch out, shake and use my muscles a bit. I'm so weak, it's been years.

I'm doing it, guys, one day at a time. ... But experience tells me that bad days tend to be followed by good ones, so even though the forecast for tomorrow is frankly Siberian, I'm hoping to go to work with a smile on my face.
Three weeks ago I was in hell. My body went through an absolute horror show of pain. Fever, shakes, nausea, muscle cramps... insomnia, jesus.
By the time the conversation was over I wanted to be drunk or high, god I was frustrated.
Six weeks clean, feels like kind of a big deal!
I actually asked them to move the bottles. I wanted to yell "Put that away! I'm doing well but holy hell, a person can only take so much before they'll snap!"
I didn't take a suboxone and was fully off any type of narcotic.
This shit takes the withdrawals away but it is almost not even worth it.
I'm going to NA/AA meetings on days I don't have the outpatient group therapy.
I haven't touched an opiate in almost 5 months.
I really really want to use again.
Since going cold turkey a bit more than a week ago I’ve hardly had any cravings for the stuff.
I kicked my h habit about 3 weeks ago and haven’t had the urge to use more than every now and then since
it's about my mindset when I was using
I'm over the worst why go right back.
when you feel you need to get out at moments of clarity and joy let it happen to let the Trick know what they have been missing. It doesn't have to be 24hr lockdown after the initial withdrawls.
Now I have ran out of road and am now in the midst of finding a new path, one without all the obstacles.
I can tell the difference. Gotta keep my mind focused.
Crawling my ass out of bed is easier.

and it was my mom's birthday. Didn't get to spend much time with her, but the joy I saw on her face when I wished her a happy birthday before anything else and her knowing it was sincere and that I am sober
I'm going to hunker down and get the absolute shit beat out of me with these withdrawals.
I went from 14mg-2mg. Until without my doctor's supervision or knowledge decided I had enough of the shackled and jumped off the subs at 2mg.
Tried to cold turkey approx 8mg sub last year went a month clean and I just couldn't bear it anymore.
I PROMISE YOU if you just STAY THE FUCK AWAY FROM OPIATES, and have a vision of what you want your life to look like.
I ran out of my meds soon after I got out and am continuing to heal up, find a job and change my life around. It's been 4 days since I did any opiates and hope I can continue to stay sober.
I never get withdrawals; I use to but got past the worst of my addiction and now I only use two times a week give or take a day.
Lope definitely helped my withdrawals the first three days and then when I woke up on the 4th day, I felt completely fine.

Starting all over now. Day 3. My withdrawals are never really that bad besides the sleep problem but I just take two extremely high doses of loperamide each 48 hours apart and before I know it i'm clear of the withdrawals
I just got out of my 2nd stint in rehab today and my mother is sooo supportive. I am now 23 and feel like I need to get it right this time; I know I do not want to pick up.

Well today I sat in my room, usually takes me 10 to 15 minutes to completely focus my thoughts on my breathing as I do mainly concentration breathing. ... Well unbeknownst to me I got stuck consciously in this pattern and did not recognize my body and could not feel my extremities.
Working out and meditating has saved me from wanting to ever use again
Well the hot water did not penetrate the super thick ice so I started using lake water and finally he escaped.
I remember endless aching Timeless nights spent sleepless, taking anything to stop the shaking,
On to rehab, it was my second one. The first one I planned on using as soon as I got out and I did. This one I wanted to but at the same time, I can't do this to my mother anymore.

I went to buy a bag, but my dude know we trying to stop putting money in his pocket so the mf gives me four bags for free, cool dude, right? No, cuz now I’m going back to buy 10 more because those four bags put us back a hell of a lot and we are not ready to start all over.
They made the W 80% better, I am at day 3 of W but it feels like day 1.
I am currently on my third day of detox.
I made a post about taking a small shot in the middle of my wd, and I am soo glad I did cuz yea I had to start the wd all over but it is like 1/3 painfull so I am actually enjoying myself.
Being clean is hard but if I keep it up mabye some day I won’t have to keep fighting the urge to use or to kill myself.
Post Title: Day 7 of my cold turkey withdrawal .
First off, i am on day 7 of quitting cold turkey. Yeah!!!!!
Post Title: Day 8 of my cold turkey withdrawal, Progress update.
I'm finally over the physical withdraws, which is great.
My dealer always told me if I ever wanted to quit he would completely cut me off and I finally gave him the word and he completely cut me off lol.
I’m clean now with 25 days sober

Today I decided to completely clean out my car head to toe trying to make sure all drugs and drug paraphernalia are out of my car so I’m riding clean (vacuumed,got all trash out and wiped everything down).
yesterday I went to a methadone clinic and got prescribed 15 mg and I took it, today I woke up around the same time and woke up sweaty with chills and hot flashes

we are trying to figure out what we need to look into over the weekend, despite losing it all I am glad I can say we don't have to worry about where money will come and trying to get through each day without having to WD
My main question here for my people in recovery is what significant or little changes have you noticed in yourself? For me it's my self image and learning to love myself.
Until one day I just had to leave because I was dope sick and never went back.
Luckily I've only been using everyday for about 3 weeks, but fuck. I'm 24 hours into withdraw and it's tough.
This is my first sober weekend so I'm staying busy. ... This is my first time taking the total abstinence path, so I felt isolated but met some really cool guys at the meeting and got some numbers.
Today is day 13 for me! This is the longest I've been sober since summer 2011, and first time I'm really sober.
I feel like I am getting cold
And I looked old as a teenager and was the guy most likely to get away with buying cigs in high school, but I seemed to stop aging or go in reverse when I started using.
I take one, and I feel no more WD, and I take another - now, I want to play some CS:GO. In fact, I feel better than I normally do on fent.
I had about 1mg of sub last night, and I'm 100% dry
No, I'm not tapering, using subs, or any of that pussy shit -- no lope either because I'm a man goddamnit.
After 90 hours since my last oxycodone dose, I can officially say that I am withdrawal free (with minor exception).
I've had to call on my clean friends and therapist every single day for the past week. Hanging on for dear life here.
I have zopiclone but not super keen on that.
Smoked a roach I had in my ash tray on Friday night and felt immense relief from the nasty cravings I was/am getting for my DOC. Also, I'm on day 23 CT
I just hit 96 hours into my current detox.
I'm barely 100 hours into my detox but I'm just thinking about last Wednesday around noon, three hours after my last dose,
I'm an addict in early recovery (Feb. 22)

I shot the remaining half gram of dope that was mixed in my rig full of blood and frustration into a shoe box full of needles and decided to quit! I had 11 8mg subs, and 3100 dollars under my mattress, and a job still,but had enough of dull needles and endless nights alone.
I managed to kick a 8 ball a day habit on 9 suboxin.
I'm withdrawing and will be up aaall night. Someone said withdrawing is paying back all the happiness/good feelings you had while you were high lol.
I didn't even go back to IV use this time around, only smoking tar. However my tolly shot straight back up to spending $100+ a day.
Headed into day 4 now of withdrawal from bth. Far from my first rodeo but I'm at the breaking point.
Headed into day 5 of cold turkey with evening coming into sight....this morning was the worst so far. Haven't slept still at all, just absolutely miserable and losing my mind.
I truly didn't think I would make it cold turkey.
I went through a very long period where I only played video games while high, and it no longer sounds appealing.

coming off a 3 week heroin binge... expecting to be ready to die in about eight hours
I've not done any dope/forced detox because of lack of funding... I may hold off a bit longer so my W/D experience isnt as bad.

I got one to help cope with withdrawal and chip off Heroin, because for some reason I don't feel a craving for Oxy like I do with Heroin and as long as I do a tiny bit of opiate I can usually endure any remaining w/d symptoms.
Thats what's been keeping me through this withdrawal! I cut both cold turkey once.

I can get more every day (I go to a pharmacy daily for my dose, and they aren't too good about watching you actually take it), do you think it's possible for me to taper down and jump off with this much suboxone?

My doctor even says that I was stabilized far too high at detox (which is rare from what I hear) and I'm on a taper plan where I drop 2mg per week down to 8 (currently on 10, dropping to 8 tomorrow), and 2mg every 2 weeks after that until I'm down to 2, which I'll probably stay on for a while just as a safety net as I finish getting my life together.
I was in hardcore, white knuckle, cold turkey withdrawal(puking, shitting, cold sweats, can't get comfortable, etc).
I'm happy to get coffee, talk recovery, etc.

made it to day 2 cold turkey

column6: I pulled down his jeans and stuck him in the thigh with the IM syringe. A few moments later he was in serious pain. He was still pale and sweating but now crying from the pain of precipitated w/d.

verbatim_example: I went to my first NA meeting today.
I went 9 days straight fucked up basically all day.
I don't know why I've been fucking up so badly lately. But I can't seem to get more than a few days clean. This is the beginning of day 4. It's longest I've gone since getting 30 days.
I've tried the whole be friends with them just do different things. Turns out I'm capable of that for about a week, 2 tops, before I'm using again.
I immediately run to the bathroom and turn on a cold bath. I tell my friend that we need to carry her in there to try and shock her out of this.
And inside is some of the best dope I've ever snorted!
I finally quit over the weekend.
I actually got high! That first shot was fucking amazing!
I currently take 20mg opana and 120mg oxycodone daily.

so we headed to the spot. when we were there one of the dope boys who owes us money (he wrecked my car) was there. finally paid some more of his tab. in dope of course, which doesn't help my car, but so it goes.
